version_description:
1. File upload optimization
2. Unify the color of the default avatar in multiple platforms
3. Official account added star
4. Delete account in the program
5. Camera, camera optimization
6. Image upload speed optimization
7. Optimize communication performance
8. Video messages play automatically by default
9. Bug fixes and product optimization

1. In-app photos and videos will be stored locally
2. Improve the clarity of the video
3. Phone number display optimization
4. Preview file page supports left slide back
5. Optimized back to bottom speed
6. Weak network environment optimization
7. Bug fixes and product improvements
fix display problem with unread count of message

Search chat optimization
Compatible with some special characters
Optmize network connection
Bug fixes and product improvements

At Notification: Support @group members for notification
Sync Chat History: You can download all history message from Me - Data and Storage - Sync Chat History for a new linked device.
Live Photos: Now you can send live photos to chats.
Optimize UI of the Input box
Bug fixes and product improvements

1. Notification settings will be stored on the server
2. Long press the avatar to @groupmember
3. Bug fixes and product improvements

Feature
• Set self-destruct mode in private chat
• Add support for iPad
• Add support for sending long picture message
• Group admin could clear history for all members
• Auto-download setting for picture message
• Drop down in-app notifications for quick reply

Fixes
• Crash when share profle photo
• Display issue for recording interactive animation

Other
• Show name on pic/video message
• Power saving for iPhone SE & iOS 11/12

New features
1. Long press the chat list to peek at the chat without marking it as read
2. Multi picture video media can be sent as a group
3. Unread bubbles can be dragged to eliminate
4. all media support more advanced search functions
5. Users can set their own status
6. Support for creating groups of 100,000 people
7. System messages can also be replied to, deleted
8. Image videos can be saved directly from messages to albums

Experience Optimization
1. Add the background color to the pinned chat in the forwarding interface
2. Ensure that the order of images sent in a batch is consistent with the order of selection
3. Receiving messages that do not ring during a call
4. You can choose the sending quality of the image when editing it.

Bug fixed
1. The clock starts only when the phone is connected
2. Occasional use of the wrong source group for friend applications
3. Correction of unread numbers on back-office withdrawal messages

- Fix the scrolling issue of chat list.
- Fix the issue that iPad search results will not display.

- Now you can pin up to 5 messages to the top in the chat.
- You can sync all history to new members in encrypted group
- Tap the nickname of the forwarded message could jump to the source message.
- Bug fixes and product improvements

- Privacy settings- who can call me
- Auto-play video on message bubbles
- Bug fixes and product improvements

Chat input box supports paste pictures, videos, files to send
Picture message can be copied
Bug fixes and product improvements

- Group member management could set members' permissions of edit and delete messages
- Favorite sticker, recent sticker could be sync
- Group chat links are modified to HTTPS links
- Fix the problem of abnormal highlighting of some search results.
- Fix the camera focus lockout
- Bug fixes and product improvements

- Voice messages could be converted to text locally
- Support non-bubble mode for chat UI
- Sharing files to other apps would retain the original name
- When editing a picture you could quickly cover face
- Bug fixes and product improvements

- Chat Folder
- Long messages will be folded by default
- Group management for Anonymous group
- New font size, line height and paragraph spacing settings for Notebook
- Support command + . = Esc for iPad
- New privacy settings for avatar, forwarded messages and status
- Bug fixes and product improvements

New Features

- Multiple accounts
- Voice verification code
- New global search
- Message Status.
- Grey single tick: sent to server
- colored single tick: notification is displayed on the other party's device
- colored double tick: read by the other party

Message

- Quick reply message from Notification
- The time of the video message text can be clicked e.g. 00:03
- Voice to text will mark the voice as read
- Pinned messages support search function
- You can edit messages when you are disconnected
- Forwarding messages can be selected by group chat

Groups

- Contacts New Friends→New Requests, New Member Review function
- You can set a alias name for the group name
- Group owner can quit from the group
- Name in System messages is clickable

Optimization

- Cancel the floating ball design of the synchronized chat bubble and change it to the chat list page
- Show thumbnails of pictures and video messages on the chat list page
- Preview images can be edited (like mark or text sth.) and sent back with one click
- Device management optimization.
- Put it on the first level of settings page
- Priority display of device name instead of app version
- Online time formatting changed to make it clearer
- Online time format follows 12 and 24 hour system
- Chat - plus - new chat group entrance

Notebook

- Notebook add breadcrumb navigation
- Notebook new notes added new entrance

Fixed

- Media browsing can only slide through 50 resources in one direction
- Image not show after downloading
